name: Tarzan Swinger: Fun Games
description:
Play the best fun casual game on iPhone and iPad - Tarzan Swinger!

Get Tarzan safely through each level with a tap of your finger! Complete each level to unlock the next, with over 20+ levels to play! Complete all levels in one world to unlock the next world (more worlds coming soon)!

Game Features:
-- Easy-to-learn controls.
-- Fun and fast gameplay
-- Great for all ages!

Can you unlock *all* levels and worlds? TRY YOUR SKILLS NOW IN TARZAN SWINGER!

For our privacy policy, please visit TarzanSwinger.com/privacy-policy

For our Terms of Service, please visit TarzanSwinger.com/terms-of-use

For any other questions, you may contact us at help@TarzanSwinger.com
